topic_or_construct: Stigmatization toward people with sexual attractions to children
justification: "The stigmatization of people with sexual attractions to children was measured using Imhoff's (2015) stigma and punitive attitudes scale (SPS)."
The SPS "is a questionnaire comprised of 35 items divided into four stigma domains: 1. Dangerousness …" indicating this subscale measures perceived dangerousness.

topic_or_construct: Perceptions of intentionality (choice over pedophilic attractions)
justification: The same passage lists "2. Intentionality (e.g., 'If someone is pedophilic, there is nothing they can do about it')" as a distinct subscale.
Domain 3 of the SPS is described as "Deviance (e.g., 'Pedophiles are sick')" showing this subscale assesses perceived deviance.
Domain 4 of the SPS is listed as "Punitive attitudes ('Pedophiles should be forced to undergo therapy')" indicating this sub-scale measures punitive sentiments.

measured_by: Nine-item pedophilia knowledge questionnaire (self-created true/false statements)
justification: "To measure knowledge about pedophilia … we wrote a list of nine statements … we computed a 'proportion correct' score for each participant."

topic_or_construct: Perceived risk posed by patients with sexual attractions to children
justification: "We measured general levels of perceived risk … using a self-created four-item measure to examine concerns about the potential risks posed by patients with sexual attractions to children."

measured_by: Adapted 11-item Treatment Priorities Measure (from B4U-ACT survey)
justification: "We used the treatment priorities measure reported in B4U-ACT's (2011) survey … This measure consists of 11 items stating possible treatment targets."

topic_or_construct: Attributions about the nature of sexual interests in children
measured_by: Adapted Feldman & Crandall (2007) Mental Illness Attribution Scale (17 items)
justification: "We adapted Feldman and Crandall's (2007) 17-item measure of attributions about mental health to tap into the kinds of attributions that participants made about the nature of 'sexual interests in children'."

topic_or_construct: Competence, comfort, support need, risk and reporting intentions when treating MAPs
measured_by: Self-produced progressive vignette with seven judgment items
justification: "We self-produced a progressive vignette … After each of which participants completed the same set of judgment questions… Each statement was rated using a six-point scale."
